channel.title: How RuneScape stopped botting, and how to bypass one thing
channel.description:
I've been trying to make a runescape bot (simple pixel checking and mouse positioning), so I thought i'd try to figure out how RuneScape 'blocked' the bots. I have found two methods of how they do it: 1) They very gradually and un-noticeably (I did it through pixel checking the same spot in the same position over-and-over) adjust the color of everything, so pixel checks mess up. 2) They very slowly and also un-noticeably adjust the camera, so position checking messes up.
Now, I have found a way to bypass the pixel check, but I have yet to try the camera check, here it is: [code]removed by me :3[/code]
You simply put in the x and y coords of the color you want to check, and the color you want to check is there, if that color is found it will return true.

item.title: How RuneScape stopped botting, and how to bypass one thing
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

Removed the code due to people wanting me to remove it.
But I have now bypassed the camera check, and the bot moves to the proper places 10/10 tested times, I will be creating an autobot.

Read full topic

item.title: How RuneScape stopped botting, and how to bypass one thing
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

It can’t be patched drubrkletern, and if it i’m happy, less bots. The only way to patch it is the increase the color change, which means that I simply widen my margins, but that will cause problems for Jagex as the entire map would be changing colors more noticeably.

Read full topic

item.title: How RuneScape stopped botting, and how to bypass one thing
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:7, topic:425956”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=528645.msg3855532#msg3855532 date=1324332544]
Should remove this and just have people request it, Jagex comes on the site every once and a while to see what we are up too.
[/quote]

But the ToS says they cant :C[/quote]
Though I know you are joking about that, ToS are not really legal. More of guide lines of the site, like we can’t sue Jagex from coming on the site but if we know they have an account we will remove it. Basically just the ideal or code of conduct of a site more the actual laws.

Read full topic

item.title: How RuneScape stopped botting, and how to bypass one thing
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

AtomicInt_:

I’ve already seen that, that wasn’t really a law suite though.The could take us to court for speaking of creating a new bot or trying to bypass their systems. Couldn’t they?

Yes, but if it’s only a minor thing they won’t bother, they’ll just request you take it down. However, if over 300k users have it, then it becomes an issue.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

They can’t adjust the colors to much more, otherwise everything will be glowing and changing colors, it just won’t work, if they adjust it more I widen the margins, it’s that simple.

Besides, the camera pass is still in there, though I have an idea of how to bypass that, i’ll try it in bout an hour.
